Class UserLogic

extends java.lang.Object

      • getUser

        public UserClass getUser​(java.lang.String name,
                         int phone,
                         java.lang.String email)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Provides the correct user from a collection of users according to the given parameters
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the user
        phone - the phone number of the user
        email - the email address of the user
        Returns:
        the corresponding UserClass object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the user with the given details does not exist

      • addUser

        public UserClass addUser​(java.lang.String name,
                         int phone,
                         java.lang.String email)
        Stores a new user information to the collection of users
        Parameters:
        name - the new user's name
        phone - the new user's phone number
        email - the new user's email address
        Returns:
        the new user object

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking​(UserClass uc,
                       java.lang.String TID,
                       MovieShowing ticket,
                       int amount,
                       double price,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> Seat)
        Appends a purchase history to the user's transaction record
        Parameters:
        uc - the user that purchases
        TID - the ticket ID
        ticket - the chosen show in a particular cinema on a particular date, encapsulated in MovieShowing class
        amount - the number of tickets bought
        price - the total price
        Seat - the chosen seat positions

      • showBooking

        public void showBooking​(UserClass uc)
        Displays the user's purchase history if any
        Parameters:
        uc - the user having the record
